title: Creating  Serious Ranked 5's Team - High Gold+
body:
I'm a gold 1 Mid lane and ADC main who is looking to form a serious team, and find a group of players that are all quality and can play up to plat level. I'm willing to play either ADC or Mid, so I am currently looking for players of all roles. It will be a more serious team, who will have set times to both practice and scrim, while constantly looking to improve and become a solid team.

Looking for Gold 1+ players.

If you're interested, please answer the following:

Current Rank:
Preferred Role:
Main Champs in Pref Role:
Communication Level (1-10):
Ranked 5's experience:
Reasons for wanting to join:
How available are you? (1-10)

Thanks guys.
